tours.name: Best of Northern Italy
tours.description: Join us for an unforgettable journey through Northern Italy, where you will experience breathtaking landscapes, rich history, and vibrant culture.
tours.long_description: Day one begins in Milan with a city walking tour and welcome dinner. On day two, we visit Lake Como for a relaxing boat cruise and explore Bellagio. Day three takes us to the Dolomites for panoramic views and alpine village visits. On day four, enjoy the scenic beauty of Lake Garda and sample local cuisine. Travel to Verona on day five to explore its Roman amphitheater and Juliet’s balcony. Day six includes a full day discovering Venice, from St. Mark’s Basilica to a gondola ride. On day seven, travel south to Florence and explore Renaissance art and architecture. Finally, day eight wraps up in Rome with a guided tour of the Colosseum and a farewell dinner.
tours.inclusions: Accommodation, meals, guided tours, and transportation.

tours.name: Alpine Adventures in Switzerland
tours.description: Embark on a scenic journey through Switzerland’s majestic Alps, pristine lakes, and charming villages.
tours.long_description: Day one begins in Zurich with a city tour and a welcome dinner. On day two, travel to Lucerne to visit the Chapel Bridge and cruise across Lake Lucerne. Day three takes you to Interlaken for a day of hiking or paragliding in the Bernese Oberland. Ride the Glacier Express to Zermatt on day four and admire the Matterhorn. On day five, explore Geneva’s Old Town and enjoy Swiss chocolate tasting. The final day wraps up with a visit to Lausanne and scenic vineyards before returning to Zurich for departure.
tours.inclusions: Accommodation, daily breakfast, guided tours, train transportation, and entrance fees.

tours.name: Flavors of Southern France
tours.description: Savor the essence of Provence and the French Riviera in this sensory journey through sunlit vineyards and seaside towns.
tours.long_description: Arrive in Marseille and explore its old port and markets. Visit Avignon and the Palais des Papes. Spend a day wine tasting in Châteauneuf-du-Pape.
tours.inclusions: Accommodation, regional meals, wine tastings, transport, and cultural tours.

tours.name: Iceland Explorer: Fire & Ice
tours.description: Discover the land of glaciers and volcanoes with an immersive loop around Iceland’s Ring Road.
tours.long_description: Day one starts in Reykjavik with a geothermal spa visit. On day two, explore the Golden Circle and see geysers and waterfalls. Day three takes you to the South Coast with black sand beaches. Visit Vatnajökull Glacier on day four and take a glacier lagoon boat tour. On day five, hike volcanic landscapes in the East Fjords. Day six brings you to the geothermal towns in the North. Enjoy whale watching in Akureyri on day seven. Wrap up with a farewell dinner in Reykjavik on day eight.
tours.inclusions: Hotel stays, transport, breakfast, entry to national parks, and guided hikes.

tours.name: Castles and Culture of Scotland
tours.description: Journey through historic castles, whisky distilleries, and dramatic Highlands in this unforgettable Scottish experience.
tours.long_description: Start in Edinburgh with a visit to the castle and royal mile. Day two takes you to Stirling and Doune Castle. Day three explores Loch Lomond and the Trossachs. Day four includes a scenic train ride to Fort William. On day five, visit Eilean Donan Castle and travel to Isle of Skye.
tours.inclusions: Accommodation, entrance fees, daily transport, whisky tasting, and tour guide.

tours.name: Greek Island Escape
tours.description: Hop across the iconic Cycladic islands and experience Greece’s beaches, ruins, and charming towns.
tours.long_description: Begin in Athens with a tour of the Acropolis. On day two, sail to Mykonos for seaside charm and nightlife. Explore Delos and its ruins on day three.
tours.inclusions: Island ferries, accommodations, breakfast, guided tours, and entry fees.

tours.name: Andalusian Discovery
tours.description: Explore southern Spain’s flamenco culture, Moorish palaces, and sun-soaked cities.
tours.long_description: Start in Seville with flamenco and tapas. Visit the Mezquita in Córdoba on day two. Return to Seville on day three for a farewell dinner.
tours.inclusions: Accommodation, transport, meals, and guided cultural experiences.

tours.name: Croatia Coastal Cruise
tours.description: Cruise the Adriatic Sea from Split to Dubrovnik with stops at Croatia’s most picturesque islands.
tours.long_description: Board in Split and explore Diocletian’s Palace. Cruise to Hvar on day two for beach lounging. Visit Korčula’s medieval town on day three.
tours.inclusions: Cruise accommodation, all meals on board, shore excursions, and port fees.

tours.name: Highlights of Portugal
tours.description: Uncover Portugal’s historic cities, coastal beauty, and soulful music on this unforgettable tour.
tours.long_description: Begin in Lisbon with tram rides and Fado music. Day two explores Sintra’s palaces. Travel to Coimbra on day three for university history. Day four includes wine tasting in the Douro Valley. On day five, arrive in Porto and cruise the river. Explore Porto’s old town on day six. Day seven takes you to Aveiro and its canals. Return to Lisbon on day eight for a farewell feast.
tours.inclusions: Hotels, transport, wine tastings, cultural shows, and meals.

tours.name: Wild Landscapes of Norway
tours.description: Traverse Norway’s majestic fjords, remote villages, and epic train routes on this wild Nordic adventure.
tours.long_description: Start in Oslo with a city highlights tour. Travel to Flåm via scenic train on day two. Cruise the Nærøyfjord on day three. Visit Bergen’s fish markets and harbor on day four. Hike around Trolltunga on day five. Drive to Ålesund on day six with photo stops. Explore Geirangerfjord on day seven. Conclude in Oslo with a farewell dinner on day eight.
tours.inclusions: Fjord cruises, rail tickets, lodging, breakfasts, and hiking guides.

tours.name: Classic Japan Highlights
tours.description: Experience the timeless beauty of Japan through bustling cities, historic temples, and stunning natural landscapes.
tours.long_description: Begin in Tokyo with visits to the Meiji Shrine and bustling Shibuya Crossing. Travel to Nikko for its UNESCO World Heritage temples and scenic beauty on day two. Day three brings you to Hakone to enjoy hot springs and views of Mount Fuji. On day four, explore historic Takayama with its well-preserved Edo-period streets. Visit Kanazawa on day five to see traditional gardens and samurai districts. Spend day six in Kyoto exploring famous temples and geisha districts. Travel to Nara on day seven to visit the giant Buddha and deer park. End in Osaka on day eight with vibrant food markets and nightlife.
tours.inclusions: Accommodation, meals, guided tours, transportation including trains and buses.

tours.name: Balkan Trail Adventure
tours.description: Experience the hidden gems of the Balkans on a thrilling journey through rugged mountains, historic towns, and cultural crossroads.
tours.long_description: Start in Sarajevo with a city and war history tour. Travel to Mostar on day two to walk its famous bridge. Explore Dubrovnik on day three with a cable car ride. Visit Kotor and its fjord-like bay on day four. Spend day five hiking in Durmitor National Park. Day six takes you to Skopje for local markets and Ottoman architecture. On day seven, explore Lake Ohrid. Wrap up in Tirana with a lively farewell dinner on day eight.
tours.inclusions: Hotels, regional transport, entrance tickets, and guided hikes.

tours.name: Classic Japan Discovery
tours.description: Immerse yourself in Japan's timeless traditions, vibrant cities, and serene temples from Tokyo to Kyoto.
tours.long_description: Arrive in Tokyo and explore Asakusa and Shibuya. On day two, visit Mt. Fuji and Lake Kawaguchi. Travel to Hakone on day three for hot springs. Ride the bullet train to Kyoto on day four. Visit temples and a tea ceremony on day five. Explore Nara and its deer park on day six. On day seven, travel to Osaka for food markets. Spend day eight visiting Hiroshima and the Peace Memorial Park. On day nine, relax in Kobe and sample local cuisine. Return to Tokyo on day ten for departure.
tours.inclusions: Rail passes, accommodations, guided tours, and cultural experiences.

tours.name: Canadian Rockies Escape
tours.description: Experience the wild beauty of the Canadian Rockies on this nature-filled escape through Alberta’s national parks.
tours.long_description: Start in Calgary with a welcome dinner. Travel to Banff on day two for scenic drives and gondola rides. Visit Lake Louise and Moraine Lake on day three. Explore Yoho National Park and Emerald Lake on day four. Hike in Jasper National Park on day five. Cruise Maligne Lake on day six. Return to Banff for hot springs and leisure on day seven. End in Calgary with a group breakfast on day eight.
tours.inclusions: Hotel stays, park passes, transportation, and guided hikes.

tours.name: The Heart of Central Europe
tours.description: Travel through grand capitals and medieval towns on this enchanting Central European journey.
tours.long_description: Start in Prague with a castle district tour. On day two, explore Kutná Hora and its bone church. Travel to Vienna on day three for classical music and palaces. Spend day four at Schönbrunn Palace and cafes. Day five brings you to Budapest with evening river cruise. Explore thermal baths and ruin pubs on day six. Day seven visits Bratislava’s old town. Return to Prague on day eight with farewell dinner.
tours.inclusions: Transport, hotels, breakfast, and city guides.

tours.name: Sunny Escape along China’s Southern Coast
tours.description: Relax amidst China’s stunning coastal scenery, ancient towns, and vibrant culinary traditions.
tours.long_description: Begin in Guangzhou with a city tour and Cantonese culinary delights. On day two, travel to Kaiping to explore its famous Diaolou watchtowers. Spend day three in Yangshuo enjoying the Li River cruise and stunning karst landscapes. On day four, explore the ancient town of Fenghuang with its riverside architecture. On day five, return to Guangzhou for a farewell dinner and leisure time.
tours.inclusions: Accommodation, meals, guided tours, river cruise, and transportation.

tours.name: Moroccan Caravan Experience
tours.description: Wander through Morocco’s souks, desert dunes, and vibrant cities on this exotic North African tour.
tours.long_description: Arrive in Casablanca with a city tour. On day two, travel to Rabat and Meknes. Day three includes Fes with its historic medina. Journey to the Sahara on day four for camel trekking. Camp under the stars on day five. Travel through the Atlas Mountains on day six. Arrive in Marrakech on day seven and visit its gardens. Depart from Casablanca on day eight.
tours.inclusions: Accommodations, meals, camel trek, and local guides.

tours.name: Danube River Cruise
tours.description: Sail along the Danube River through Central Europe’s most elegant cities and baroque towns.
tours.long_description: Begin in Budapest and enjoy a nighttime cruise. Visit Esztergom and Bratislava on day two. Dock in Vienna on day three and attend a concert. On day four, explore the Wachau Valley. Visit Linz and Salzburg on day five. Cruise to Melk Abbey on day six. Arrive in Passau on day seven. Disembark in Munich on day eight for farewell brunch.
tours.inclusions: Cruise accommodation, onboard meals, shore excursions, and concerts.

tours.name: Wild Patagonia Trek
tours.description: Challenge yourself in the wilderness of Patagonia on a guided trek through South America’s most epic landscapes.
tours.long_description: Arrive in El Calafate and visit Perito Moreno Glacier. On day two, travel to El Chaltén. Begin trekking Fitz Roy trails on day three. Day four includes glacier lakes and lookout points. Continue hikes to remote valleys on day five. On day six, return to El Calafate. Fly to Torres del Paine on day seven. Depart from Punta Arenas on day eight.
tours.inclusions: Guides, campsites, transport, meals, and park permits.

tours.name: The Baltic Capitals
tours.description: Unveil the charm of Estonia, Latvia, and Lithuania with this enriching cultural tour of the Baltic region.
tours.long_description: Start in Tallinn with medieval Old Town tours. On day two, enjoy the Estonian coast and castles. Travel to Riga on day three for Art Nouveau architecture. Day four explores the central market and local cuisine. Travel to Vilnius on day five with stops at Hill of Crosses. Visit Trakai Castle on day six. Explore Vilnius' old town on day seven. Depart from Vilnius on day eight.
tours.inclusions: Hotels, transport, breakfast, and local guided tours.
